channel.title: Lost gaming! PvP, Towny, iConomy. great community
channel.description:
Lost world - 176.31.145.19 www.lostgaming.co.uk
Lost World is a free for all Towny orientated server where players fight for survival. You can create your own town and join a nation or make your own. Griefing and stealing is allowed. Tnt, Lava flow and fire spread are all enabled, this is a very unique server with some nice staff.
We are currently running on a 4.5GB host with 7gb of Burst RAM (Total 11.5), The VPS itself is an i7.
Plugins Enabed:
Towny iConomy War (TDM & CTF) WorldGuard WorldEdit NoCheat Permissions Essentials LogBlock Anti Xray Auto Save
There is also the option to donate to help the server maintain itself, by donating you will receive some perks:
VIP only shop Community Warp Locations 3 homes Server Priority Several chat commands 1 Locked indestructible chest Alternative Spawn location Ability to make temporary rooms in our mumble server Ability to make your own shop
If you do wish to donate, there is a link on the website which tells you how to go about it. It is a £5 (Around $8USD) once off donation to get VIP.
Thank you for taking a look, hopefully you stop by!
